amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funds for the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission by $7,143,000, and to reduce funds for NASA by $26,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds for the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission by $7,143,000, and reduce funds for NASA by $26,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 96 - 314 (Roll no. 216).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 96 - 314 (Roll no. 216).
